languages.text: {n}Странно, что старший офицер проводит инспекцию в одиночку. По уставу здесь должен быть целый наряд инфернусов, а личное присутствие Инфернус-мастера необходимо лишь в критических ситуациях.{/n}

{n}It is strange that the senior officer is conducting the inspection alone. According to the regulations, there should be an entire squad of inferni, and the personal presence of the Infernus Master is necessary only in emergencies.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Странно, что старший офицер проводит инспекцию в одиночку. По уставу здесь должен быть целый наряд инфернусов, а личное присутствие Инфернус-мастера необходимо лишь в критических ситуациях.{/n}

{n}It is strange that the senior officer is conducting the inspection alone. According to the regulations, there should be an entire squad of inferni, and the personal presence of the Infernus Master is necessary only in emergencies.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es extraño que el oficial de mayor rango esté llevando a cabo la inspección él solo. La normativa estipula claramente que debe haber una cuadrilla entera de infernus con él en todo momento, y la presencia del maestro de infernus solo se requiere en caso de emergencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is strange that the senior officer is conducting the inspection alone. According to the regulations, there should be an entire squad of inferni, and the personal presence of the Infernus Master is necessary only in emergencies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es extraño que el oficial de mayor rango esté llevando a cabo la inspección él solo. La normativa estipula claramente que debe haber una cuadrilla entera de infernus con él en todo momento, y la presencia del maestro de infernus solo se requiere en caso de emergencia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}上級士官が一人で検査を行っているのは奇妙です。規定によれば、インフェルニの分隊は全員いるはずで、インフェルヌスマスターがいることは緊急時にのみ必要とされています。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is strange that the senior officer is conducting the inspection alone. According to the regulations, there should be an entire squad of inferni, and the personal presence of the Infernus Master is necessary only in emergencies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}上級士官が一人で検査を行っているのは奇妙です。規定によれば、インフェルニの分隊は全員いるはずで、インフェルヌスマスターがいることは緊急時にのみ必要とされています。{/n}

languages.text: {n}高阶军官独自进行例行检查，这样的做法相当古怪。根据规定，检查工作应当由完整的控火行会分队完成，只有在紧急情况下，控火大师本人才需要到场。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is strange that the senior officer is conducting the inspection alone. According to the regulations, there should be an entire squad of inferni, and the personal presence of the Infernus Master is necessary only in emergencies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}高阶军官独自进行例行检查，这样的做法相当古怪。根据规定，检查工作应当由完整的控火行会分队完成，只有在紧急情况下，控火大师本人才需要到场。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es ist seltsam, dass der leitende Offizier die Inspektion allein durchführt. Gemäß der Regularien wäre ein ganzer Trupp von Inferni dafür verantwortlich, und die persönliche Gegenwart des Infernus-Meisters ist nur in Notfällen erforderlich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is strange that the senior officer is conducting the inspection alone. According to the regulations, there should be an entire squad of inferni, and the personal presence of the Infernus Master is necessary only in emergencies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es ist seltsam, dass der leitende Offizier die Inspektion allein durchführt. Gemäß der Regularien wäre ein ganzer Trupp von Inferni dafür verantwortlich, und die persönliche Gegenwart des Infernus-Meisters ist nur in Notfällen erforderlich.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il est étrange que cet officier se charge seul de l'inspection. D'après la réglementation, il devrait être accompagné de toute une escouade d'inferni, la présence du maître-infernus n'étant requise que pour les urgences absolues.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is strange that the senior officer is conducting the inspection alone. According to the regulations, there should be an entire squad of inferni, and the personal presence of the Infernus Master is necessary only in emergencies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il est étrange que cet officier se charge seul de l'inspection. D'après la réglementation, il devrait être accompagné de toute une escouade d'inferni, la présence du maître-infernus n'étant requise que pour les urgences absolues.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kıdemli subayın incelemeyi tek başına yürütmesi tuhaf. Mevzuata göre eksiksiz bir itfacı mangası bulunması, acil durumlarda ise İtfa Üstadının bizzat dâhil olması gerekiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is strange that the senior officer is conducting the inspection alone. According to the regulations, there should be an entire squad of inferni, and the personal presence of the Infernus Master is necessary only in emergencies.{/n}
